titles.title: To prohibit certain signatures on checks and notices issued by the Department of the Treasury, and for other purposes.
To prohibit certain signatures on checks and notices issued by the Department of the Treasury, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This bill prohibits signatures of certain government officials, including the President, Vice-President, and cabinet officials, on 2020 recovery rebate checks issued to a taxpayer. A recovery rebate is a stimulus payment made to individual taxpayers to compensate them for losses due to the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) pandemic.
